mapper.select: SELECT user_id, name, profile_img, email, gender, enable_status, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time FROM tb_person_info WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_person_info( name, profile_img, email, gender, enable_status, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUES ( #{name}, #{profileImg}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{enableStatus}, #{userType}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime} )
